ygData.subject: RE: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: Because it is something you can do in a virtual world that you don t have time for in real life or can t do.  Many people that play are handicapped or disabled
ygData.messageBody:
Because it is something you can do in a virtual world that you don't
have time for in real life or can't do. Many people that play are
handicapped or disabled and would never be able to do this in real life.
I'm sorry there aren't to many wolves outside my door to kill, skin,
and make clothes out of. One man's fun is another man's work.

Bonzz
Innoruuk

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jason Coan [mailto:COANJ@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 3:06 PM
>To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] (no subject)
>
>From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
>Sorry if this comes across wrong, but why do you enjoy having a virtual
>job so much? You pay Verant to have a job, I don't get it, I'm sure
>you have fun at it or whatever, but I would just like to understand the
>reasoning behind paying to have a virtual job?
>
>
